{{cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/iterator/title|operator[]}}
{{cpp/ranges/adjacent_transform_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr decltype(auto) operator[]( difference_type n ) const
    requires ranges::random_access_range&lt;Base&gt;;
}}

Returns an element at specified relative location.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}} be the data members of the {{rlp|iterator}}. Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
return apply([&amp;](const auto&amp;... iters) -&gt; decltype(auto)
             {
                return invoke(*parent_-&gt;fun_, iters[n]...);
             },
             inner_.current_);
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|position relative to current location}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The element at displacement {{c|n}} relative to the current location.
